comment.body: I haven't watch Moon and Dark City. The rest I like.
@Ericksoares3: Webtorrent is only using webtorrent network so it cannot see the seeders from KTorrent...

Yes, sorry I am going very slowly with this project. Unfortunately people add their videos but don't seed them... It is why you will see 0 peer and sometimes it can take a couple of minutes to find a peer.

@Shellbound: I am preparing something like this --> https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmQnxPmyWYPfk2bEs45dh7VSUMQxR8uTCzufaGmGEBrstR

I have also added a tracker dedicated for ZeroTube : http://198.211.121.40:8100/stats

@Alex (Bwoi) : I actually have the code working. It download the video start to play it in a canva that is hidden and pick a frame to show. But I thought that it would be nicer if the user could choose it either by picking a frame from the video or a customize picture. Then I thought that I would also need a blacklist in case some pictures are NSFW...
@Shellbound: You are right, this is more of a UX issue. I will try to figure out something (not too boring ;) ) that will offer a good indication that the user need to wait a little.
